page.title: 14The Rector of Worlingworth
page.content: Q1How do you find spreading your work over several parishes? A1 Interesting. Q2How are lay people involved in the organisation of your churches? A2To compensate for the shortage of clergymen,lay involvement in church affairs is increasing.The running of the church demands the services of the Church Council,the treasurer,organist, church warden,the bell ringers etc. Q3If 1 of your churches disappeared & you could replace it,what lines would you follow? A3This would be a matter for the people of hte parish to decide.The building is not the property of the parson. the Church Council would make the decision. They may decide not to replace or they may provide a smaller building more suited to present congregations.
